title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component with LangChain’s tooling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface): markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images for CPU & GPU (CUDA) usage; one-liner to run Ollama in Docker or docker-compose.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI with conversation history, model switching and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama: synchronous & asynchronous APIs, Kotlin extensions, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: generate, chat, pull, push and embed with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration: use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy lets you call Ollama models via OpenAI-compatible endpoints with cost tracking & load-balancing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: ingest PDFs into Chroma vector DB and query with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in servers; supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate-limiting and OpenAPI docs for enterprise usage.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate: strongly-typed client for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for .NET 6+ with async streams and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI plug-and-play with Ollama: upload files, switch models, export conversations.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM completion to your notes using any Ollama model.
